p: Several studies investigate land use change (LUC) in combination with climate change (e.g., van Roosmalen et al. 2009; Munoz-Arriola et al. 2009; D’Ágostino et al. 2010; Wang et al. 2014; Molina-Navarro et al. 2014; Morán-Tejeda et al. 2014; Gupta et al. 2015; El-Khoury et al. 2015), and a few papers also apply LUC projections based on socio-economic changes under climate change (Mehdi et al. 2015; Rouholahnejad Freund et al. 2017; Rajib and Merwade 2017), but to our knowledge there are no studies devoted to climate change considering impacts of land use and management changes.
